Afia Pokua (nke a maara dị ka Vim Lady ) bụ onye mgbasa ozi mba  Ghana na onye isi nhazi  mmemme na Despite Media Group, na-achikota Peace FM, Okay FM, Neat FM na Hello FM na Kumasi
Afia gara Labone Senior High School maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ gazie ulo akwuwko nta akuko na Ghana yana Ghana Institute of Management And Public Administration maka nzere bachelọ na iwu.
Ọ bụbu onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Adom FM, onye enyemaka nke Multimedia Group Limited. Afọ asaa gara aga, Afia nwara ịhapụ Mulitimedia n'ihi nghọtahie ya na ndị nchikota nwere.
N'ọnwa nke iri na  2019, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na Multimedia Group wee sonye na UTV, ụlọ ọrụ ihe onyonyo  satellite nke Despite Media Group nwe

Ugbu a, Afia Pokuaa bụ onye na-elekọta Egyaso Gyaso, usoro nyocha akụkọ a ma ama nke a na-egosi na Okay FM ubochi  Mọnde na Fraịdee n'etiti elekere asaa nke abali  na  ma o jiri okara gaa elekere itolu itolu nke abali. Ọ na-esokwa na-akwado ihe ngosi ụtụtụ nke UTV nke akpọrọ Adekye Nsroma
Radio na Television Personalities Awards onye nwanyi nta akuko nke afo 2019–2020.
Na onwa  Mee 2020, Afia Pokua kpughere na nke mbụ ya na o nwere nwa nwoke, onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma.
N'afọ 2018, ọ tọrọ ntọala SugarDem Ministry, otu na-akwado mmekọ nwoke na nwanyị nke e guzobere iji kwekọọ na PepperDem Ministry nke na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị ka ha na ụmụ nwoke nwee mmekọrịta siri ike.
